title: JPMorgan and GoldenTree Lend $525 Million for Brooklyn Development
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. and GoldenTree Asset Management financed a $525 million construction loan for a development along the Williamsburg waterfront in Brooklyn.
content: JPMorgan Chase & Co. and GoldenTree Asset Management financed a $525 million construction loan for a development along the Williamsburg waterfront in Brooklyn.
